{{Tutorial
|title  = The Continuation of the Sabzeruz Festival
|about  = The Continuation of the Sabzeruz Festival
|image1 = Tutorial The Continuation of the Sabzeruz Festival 1.png
|text1  = When you enter a state of {{Color|help|Contemplation}}, you can choose any text entry to interpret it.<br />This interpretation process involves analysis of the text entry and may yield new entries. Once interpreted, you may submit that text as a conclusion.
|image2 = Tutorial The Continuation of the Sabzeruz Festival 2.png
|text2  = Some text entries can be associated with one another once intepreted.<br />Select {{Color|help|Associate}} to choose the other text entry, then select {{Color|help|Trigger Association}}.<br />You can gain new text entries by performing accurate associations.
|image3 = Tutorial The Continuation of the Sabzeruz Festival 3.png
|text3  = If one of the text entries on the current page can be used as a conclusion, then select that entry before choosing {{Color|help|Submit Conclusion}}.
}}
